## 🧭 Objective:  
Evaluate correlations among policy traits adopted by post-revolutionary governments.
## ✍️ Prompt:   
Which policies tend to co-occur across regimes? What ideological connections do these patterns suggest?

## 📥 Setup
```{r}
policy_traits <- read_csv("assets/datasets/governance_traits.csv")

policy_traits %>%
  select(-country) %>%
  cor() %>%
  round(2)
```
